Title: Mirrors 2
Writer: Matt Venne (teleplay), Sung-ho Kim (motion picture "Geoul sokeuno")
Actors: Nick Stahl, Emmanuelle Vaugier, Evan Jones, Christy Carlson Romano
Plot: When Max, who is recovering from a traumatic accident, takes a job as a nighttime security guard, he begins to see visions of a young mysterious woman in the store's mirror.
